name: Cartoon Hero
description:
Cartoon Hero is a cartoon 3D platformer with a memorable artistic style. If you like old-school 3D platformers, then this game is your choice! Explore a few cartoon worlds, bypass all the traps and find a way out of all the labyrinths, simultaneously destroying your animated enemies.

Features:

- Juicy animated graphics

- Fascinating gameplay from the first person

- 3 interesting worlds with traps, enemies and puzzles. New worlds will be added in the following updates

- Pleasant pastime for all ages
